column4: having trouble connecting to anything but PORT 3389, changed it to 60 in regedit, and can't connect now with rdesktop command or tsclient.
did you reboot?  the change doesn't take effect until you restart the remote desktop service
I also tried 192.168.1.100:60 on the tsclient
are you crossing a firewall?  can you use a higher port? (I think I remember something about low ports being disallowed)
does netstat -a show anything listening on 60?
ok, will try higher port but netstat -a gives a listening port on 60
can you telnet into the windows machine?  (telnet <ip> 3389
for the love of god disable that thing :(
nope, Windows XP's firewall is very eager to help...unfortunately
thanks... shoulda known it was something on windows
Yeah, this is on Windows x64 Pro
btw, do you know how to ensure that I am running Feisty and not Feisty beta?
feisty is feisty AFAIK, as long as you're up to date you're fine
